name: Code4Lib New York State GitHub.io
tagline: Landing Page for the Code4Lib NYS Community GitHub Organization
body:
### Welcome to the Code4Lib New York State GitHub.io Landing Page

We are using GitHub.io currently to support a transparent and community-sourced/supported website for [the upcoming Code4Lib NYS 2016 Unconference in Ithaca. Read more about this event at that site.](http://code4libnys.github.io/c4lNYS2016/) You can also visit the [GitHub repository for that site at this link.](https://github.com/code4libNYS)

If you'd like to help with the 2016 Code4Lib NYS event, or use this GitHub organization/Pages space for another Code4Lib NYS event, [please create an issue on this repository](https://github.com/code4libNYS/code4libNYS.github.io/issues) requesting that you are added to the [Code4Lib NYS GitHub Organization.](https://github.com/code4libNYS)

Additionally, you can keep up-to-date with the Code4Lib NYS group by joining the [Code4Lib NYS Google Group.](https://groups.google.com/a/esln.org/forum/?hl=en#!forum/code4lib)

Thanks!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
